parameter.name: ticketId
parameter.description: The ID of the ticket to update

parameter.name: comment
parameter.description: A comment object that describes the problem, incident, question, or task.

parameter.name: requesterId
parameter.description: The numeric ID of the user asking for support through the ticket.

parameter.name: assigneeId
parameter.description: The numeric ID of the agent to assign the ticket to.

parameter.name: groupId
parameter.description: The numeric ID of the group to assign the ticket to.

parameter.name: organizationId
parameter.description: The numeric ID of the organization to assign the ticket to.

parameter.name: collaboratorIds
parameter.description: An array of the numeric IDs of agents or end-users to CC on the ticket. An email notification is sent to them when the ticket is created.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Allowed values are problem, incident, question, or task

parameter.name: priority
parameter.description: Allowed values are urgent, high, normal, or low

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Allowed values are new, open, pending, hold, solved or closed. Is set to open if status is not specified.

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: An array of tags to add to the ticket.

parameter.name: externalId
parameter.description: A unique external ID to link Zendesk tickets to local records.

parameter.name: forumTopicId
parameter.description: The numeric ID of the topic the ticket originated from, if any.

parameter.name: problemId
parameter.description: For tickets of type 'incident', the numeric ID of the problem the incident is linked to, if any.

parameter.name: dueAt
parameter.description: For tickets of type 'task', the due date of the task. Accepts the ISO 8601 date format (yyyy-mm-dd).

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: An array of the custom fields of the ticket.
